name: Nomboro
description:
Nomboro is a unique and exciting puzzle game where you have to fill the levels with one or more colors. Simply drag the dots to solve the maze, there is no time limit and no pressure. It feels so satisfying to solve each puzzle! Enter a zen-like meditation and a most satisfying state of mind. Let Nomboro grow on you!

Nomboro is the exciting game you'll want to tell your friends about. Which level can they get to?!

FEATURES

- Fun and relaxing to play
- Simple and satisfying
- Bright and colorful
